mapper.select: select r.id id, r.reply_id replyId, u.user_id replyMakerId, r.reply_video_id replyVideoId, r.video_author_id videoAuthorId, u.user_avatar replyMakerAvatar,u.user_name replyMakerName, r.reply_maker_content replyContent, r.reply_time replyTime, r.if_faved ifFaved from reply r left join user_info u on u.user_id = r.reply_maker_id where r.reply_video_id = #{video.id};
